comment.text: This translation key is used for the placeholder text "SearchByNameEmail" which is displayed as a hint in a search input field within the developer tools section of the Portal Settings page. It appears on a TextInput component and guides users to enter either a name or email address to perform a search.

usage.context:
<UserInputContainer>
 <UserInput ref={searchRef}>
 <TextInput
 scale
 onChange={onChangeAuthor}
 placeholder={t("SearchByNameEmail")}
 value={author}
 onFocus={openInviteInputPanel}
 isAutoFocussed
 onKeyDown={onKeyDown}
 tabIndex={5}

<UserInputContainer>
 <UserInput ref={searchRef}>
 <TextInput
 scale
 onChange={onChangeAuthor}
 placeholder={t("SearchByNameEmail")}
 value={author}
 onFocus={openInviteInputPanel}
 isAutoFocussed
 onKeyDown={onKeyDown}
 tabIndex={5}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation 'Որոնել անունով կամ էլ․հասցեով' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'Search by name or email'. The phrasing 'էլ․հասցեով' is awkward and doesn't convey 'email address' properly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Որոնել անունով կամ էլ․լրատվամասի հասցեով (Voronel anunov kam el․lratvamasi hasceov) - Search by name or email address

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'էլ․' feels clunky. It's unclear if it's intended as an abbreviation or a stylistic choice.  It disrupts the flow of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'էլ․' or replace it with a more natural phrasing.  'կամ' already indicates an alternative.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '名前または電子メールによる検索' is technically correct but could be more natural in Japanese. 'による検索' sounds a bit formal and literal. A more common phrasing would be '名前またはメールでの検索'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 名前またはメールでの検索

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Szukaj według nazwy użytkownika lub adresu e-mail' is not a direct and natural equivalent of 'Search by name or email'. 'Nazwy użytkownika' (user's name) is more specific than just 'name'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Szukaj według imienia i nazwiska lub adresu e-mail

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Search by name or email" implies an action being performed. The Sinhala translation 'නම හෝ විද්‍යුත් ලිපිනයෙන් සොයන්න' literally translates to 'Search from name or email'. While understandable, it's slightly awkward. A more natural translation would emphasize the action of searching *using* a name or email.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: නම හෝ විද්‍යුත් ලිපිනයෙන් සෙවීම (Nama hora vidyut lipinayan sevimata)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation "Претражи по имену или емаил-у" is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Serbian. The word 'email' is a direct borrowing from English and 'емаил-у' is not the standard way to use it in Serbian.  It's better to use a Serbian equivalent or adapt the English word correctly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Претражи по имену или електронској пошти

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The hyphen in 'емаил-у' is not standard Serbian punctuation.
While technically correct, "адресою електронної пошти" is a bit formal and lengthy for a user interface. A more natural and concise translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Пошук за іменем або електронною поштою
